descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/tGZ225k.jpg[/img]
[size=4]Lynn is a replace of Lydia [/size][/b][/i][/size][size=4][i][b]
[/b][/i][/size][size=4][i][b]She is more agile, versatile and fun.[/b][/i][/size][size=3][size=2]


[u]Updated v1.5[/u] (12-27-2017)

* You can use your favorite texture pack, she will adapt very well.
* Fixed neck.

Old:

* Made from scratch in CK, chequed with TES5Edit and tested.
* Vanilla Follower, this mod run over all DLC.
* She is a assassin class, support: Dual Wielding, Archery, Light Armor and Sneak.
* Level with player from 5 to 100.

* Requires ApachiiSkyHairby Apachii v1.6
Â  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168

[/size][/size]
[b][i][font=Arial][size=3]Please, send me best pics with filters and lighting improvements (ENB).
[/size][/font][/i][font=Arial][size=3]
[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3]

author: damelamochi
